name: AVAudio3DVectorOrientation
desc: A structure that represents two orthogonal vectors that describe the orientation of the listener in 3D space.

items.name: init(forward: AVAudio3DVector, up: AVAudio3DVector)
items.desc: Creates a 3D vector orientation instance using the forward and up vectors you specify.

items.name: func AVAudioMake3DVectorOrientation(AVAudio3DVector, AVAudio3DVector) -> AVAudio3DVectorOrientation
items.desc: Creates a 3D vector orientation instance using the forward and up vectors you specify.

items.name: var forward: AVAudio3DVector
items.desc: The forward vector points in the direction that the listener faces.

items.name: var up: AVAudio3DVector
items.desc: The up vector is orthogonal to the forward vector and points upward from the listenerâ€™s head.
